name: Jerry's endless travels:Save Erick (Remake)(Dragon 32)
description:
You probably already meet Jerry in games Jerry's endless travels:Save Erick (ZX Spectrum), Jerry's endless travels:Escape (ZX Spectrum) and Jerry's endless travels:Destroy cursed ball (ZX Spectrum). Now I did a remake "Jerry's endless travels:Save Erick" for dragon computers. Currently only .sna format. In this game you must save Jerry from kage.Text in this game explains the storyline. Also I used empty fields in text in order to display text correctly for dragon computer. Probably I will made more stuff about this saga (commercial ones too). Game was tested on XRoar.

Controls:

Jerry:

o-left, p-right, space- jump, b -take item, 1 - use item to destroy a ghost.

Arrow (need to move up):

q-up, a -down,o-left,p-right.  

And don't forget to verify my other videogames here. Many of them of them were updated recently.
